document.full_text: european regulators said on friday they were relaxing curbs on the use of roche's top-selling cancer drug avastin to allow its use with xeloda, another type of chemotherapy that is also made by roche.
document.title: eu body relaxes curb on avastin breast cancer use
lines_and_colors: european regulators said on friday they were relaxing curbs on the use of roche's top-selling cancer drug avastin to allow its use with xeloda, another type of chemotherapy that is also made by roche.
